about_the_game:
“Chelsea? I don't think anyone has seen her place before... At least, I don't think she invited anyone before. Cute girl, though.”

ABOUT CHELSEA

Age: 31
Height: 163
Blood: AB
Bust size: C
Origin: Colombia
Interests: Exploring the world, Meeting new people, Avoiding crowds

It turned out she also grew up in a bunker similar to yours, though her circumstances were different. Chelsea is a little more naive than your average person and certainly lacks experience with crowds. Cute girl, though.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING


This DLC unlocks the legendary champion - Chelsea, with 120 trust, enough to immediately reach level 10.

You will also receive an epic equipment set, allowing you to use her in missions immediately, along with a legendary look for Chelsea (or its equivalent in nanites if you already have it).

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities
